title: Syria appoints new defense minister -- state TV
description: DAMASCUS， July 18 (Xinhua) -- Syria appointed General Fahad Jassim al-Freij as the country's new defense minister on Wednesday after his predecessor got killed along with other officials in a suicide bombing targeting the national intelligence headquarters in the capital Damascus， the state TV reported.
cleanContent: DAMASCUS, July 18 (Xinhua) -- Syria appointed General Fahad Jassim al-Freij as the country's new defense minister on Wednesday after his predecessor got killed along with other officials in a suicide bombing targeting the national intelligence headquarters in the capital Damascus, the state TV reported.																																																																								|  |
